import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { retrievePetApi } from "../../api/todo/PetShopApiService" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Formik, Field } from "formik" export default function PetComponent() { const [description, setDescription] = useState('') const { name } = useParams() // toDO check grammar and try w id console.log(`NAME:: ${name}`) useEffect( () => retrievePet(), [name] // [[..] tells useEffect to refresh component only when name changes ) function retrievePet() { retrievePetApi(name) .then(response => { console.log(response) setDescription(response.data.description) }) .catch((error) => console.log(error)) } return
